title: Dev Blog: Updates and Splash Art

replies.body: give {{champion:44}} some love he's been since beta and still looks like it.
{{champion:92}}  RIVEN !
CANCER
in the surgeon shen splash art u see akali but not kennen, y is this??
To short to fit in the splash art maybe?
he's providing the electricity for the complex...
Lol, reminds me of Team Rocket using Pikachu to power stuff up xD...
omfg you're so right {{champion:85}} new Pikachu???
Please make this a skin Rito
Because Kennen is a doctor in his own right, akali's a nurse and is there to help, kennen's off x-ray-ing cho'gath.
because its a nurse akali skin, ken doesnt have one
because Akali is a Nurse, Shen is a surgeon but Kennen is a doctor, doctors tend not to be that involved with surgery, more important before and after the surgery
Lol, They're petty surgeon and nurse kennen is a mighty M.D.
He's the one holding down the victim.
Maybe they are doing surgery on kennen?

You guys should send out the list of champions you focusing on for the time been. Maybe some Artistic Legends maybe be able to help create ideas for the upcoming splash arts.{{champion:33}} If anyone is good though Rammus would look sick with him taunting someone or him rolling or even his ult with the earth cracking and stuff. Just trying to spark creativity.
lol is that Shockblade {{champion:238}} next to Frozen {{champion:98}}
Looks like {{champion:119}} to the right and {{champion:38}} in the background slightly to the left
The figure on the left looks more like a {{champion:238}} shadow to me.
there is no TPA {{champion:98}} ???????

If they were to update the TPA Shen splash art, they would have to update it for Orianna, Ezreal, Nunu, and Mundo as well. If they only updated Shen in the splash only, the 2016 art style would differ compared to the 2013 art style
Xin's splash art is not too pretty. Mind updating that? :3
what about poor old {{champion:19}} he really needs a new splash art
Someone give {{champion:33}} Some love please ;-;

Can u pls revert all the horrible ones that no one put any effort into, or redo them with some resources? Some of the new ones look really good like taric and rammus but groovy zilean and gentleman cho gath look like they were made by an unpaid intern with a disdain for the company. They're inexcusably awful, look out of place in terms of lack of quality and they've rendered skins I once loved unusable.
Will legacy skins be receiving splash updates as well?
Seeing as they updated Yellow Jacket Shen (which is a legacy skin), I assume they will.
Did anyone else notice Blood Moon Zilean or am I seeing thing?
TAP SHEN?????{{champion:98}}
delete swain. he is pointless and reworking him will be wasting resources.
you can't just delete champs mate
How about {{champion:39}} {{champion:28}} and mostly {{champion:44}} they all need one
Irelias fine
when is jhin the virtuoso coming out
Pumped for Shen Rework :D
But can you get rid of Ahri's vacant expression on her classic splash?
And why not update ww {{champion:19}} as well I think he needs a bit of a rework and make him cooler his splash sucks. You could have him howling or something in a battlefield of corpses
When will in game character splash reflect selected skins?
I love the Mortal Kombat ones.
Riot isnt original... Frozen {{champion:98}} 's Splash is just like Chosen {{champion:11}} 's... lmaokai
they are pretty different, the positioning of the blades is only similar.

aids.
